Title: Series: The Amarna Letters
Description: Dark clay cuneifom tablet; letter from Yapahu to the king of Egypt; 33 lines; writer's name defaced; complete.
Bibliographic references: Knudtzon, J A 1915a / Die El-Amarna Tafeln (298)
Bezold 1892a / The El-Amarna Tablets in the British Museum (50)
Pritchard 1950a / Ancient Near Eastern Texts relating to the Old Testament (page 490)
Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.175)
Sigrist M et al 2006a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, III
Condition: Good / fair; writer's name defaced?; complete.
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
